name: GutenDraw – Visualize Ideas with Excalidraw
author: Avirtum

sections.description:
Welcome to GutenDraw, the revolutionary all-in-one WordPress tool that empowers you to take your content to the next level. With GutenDraw you can showcase interactive diagrams and flowcharts in a whole new way, offering your website visitors a unique and memorable experience. GutenDraw is designed with simplicity in mind, making it easy to create and customize stunning diagramming sketches with its user-friendly interface. With GutenDraw, you can say goodbye to tedious and complex processes and focus on creating engaging content. Experience the power of GutenDraw today and take your website to the next level with its immersive, hand-drawn like diagramming capabilities. It’s perfect for bloggers, marketers, educators, and anyone looking to elevate their online content and captivate their audience.

üî• DON‚ÄôT DELAY, BE PRO TODAY!!! üî•

Imagine having the ability to craft stunning diagrams and sketches effortlessly, all while enjoying the fluidity of a well-organized workspace. GutenDraw provides you with a bird’s-eye view of your visual content, enabling you to create, edit, and manage your designs with unparalleled ease. Say goodbye to the clutter of traditional design tools and embrace a streamlined approach that allows you to focus on what truly matters‚Äîbringing your ideas to life. This plugin is a game-changer for anyone looking to enhance their content with engaging visuals, helping you soar above the limitations of conventional media management. Experience the freedom of creativity with GutenDraw and watch your WordPress site take flight!

‚òÄÔ∏è BENEFITS

Unleash Visual Storytelling: Seamlessly integrate diagrams, sketches, and illustrations into your WordPress content, elevating your visual communication.

Streamlined Diagramming: Harness the power of Excalidraw’s intuitive diagramming tools directly within your WordPress editor, streamlining your creative process.

Customizable Visuals: Personalize your diagrams with a wide range of styling options, ensuring they perfectly complement your WordPress content.

Effortless Collaboration: Collaborate with team members and clients by sharing your Excalidraw-powered diagrams directly from within WordPress.

Responsive Designs: Your GutenDraw-created diagrams and sketches are fully responsive, ensuring they adapt seamlessly across all devices and screen sizes.

Seamless Integration: GutenDraw integrates seamlessly with popular WordPress themes, plugins, and page builders, allowing you to enhance your existing content with dynamic visuals.

üî• KEY FEATURES

‚úÖ USER-FRIENDLY INTERFACE
Intuitive design that allows users to easily create and edit diagrams without needing advanced graphic design skills.

‚úÖ FLEXIBLE PERMISSION SYSTEM
A customizable permission system that allows administrators to set specific access rights for users, ensuring that sensitive content is protected while enabling collaboration.

‚úÖ BIG SHAPE LIBRARY
A wide variety of pre-defined shapes and icons to choose from, making it easy to create professional-looking diagrams.

‚úÖ TEXT ANNOTATIONS
Ability to add text labels and annotations to diagrams for better clarity and communication of ideas.

‚úÖ EXPORT OPTIONS
Users can export their drawings in various formats (e.g., PNG, SVG) for use in other applications or for sharing.

‚úÖ RESPONSIVE DESIGN
Diagrams created with GutenDraw are responsive and can be viewed on different devices without losing quality.

‚úÖ DRAG-AND-DROP FUNCTIONALITY
Easy manipulation of shapes and elements through drag-and-drop, allowing for quick adjustments.

‚úÖ UNDO/REDO FUNCTIONALITY
Users can easily revert changes or redo actions, enhancing the editing experience.

‚úÖ SAVE/LOAD DIAGRAMS
Users can save their work and load previously created diagrams for further editing.

‚úÖ SHORTCODE SUPPORT
Easily embed diagrams into posts or pages using shortcodes, allowing for flexible placement within content.

‚úÖ CUSTOM STYLING OPTIONS
Users can customize the appearance of their diagrams with different colors, line styles, and fonts.

‚úÖNEW FEATURES?
If you require additional features that are not currently available in the plugin, please provide us with your feedback. We are open to suggestions and will consider implementing them in future versions.

üöÄ COMPATIBILITY

We understand that WordPress themes and plugins can have varying structures, so we aim to ensure additional compatibility. GutenDraw integrates and functions seamlessly with the most widely-used WordPress page builders, themes, and plugins. In the rare event that GutenDraw does not work with a specific page builder, theme, or plugin, we encourage you to post in the support forum, and we will do our utmost to address and resolve the issue.

PAGE BUILDERS
* Gutenberg ‚Äì modern built-in WordPress block editor
* Classic Editor ‚Äì classic built-in WordPress editor
* Elementor – leading website builder platform on WordPress
* WP Bakery – create any layout with intuitive way
* Beaver ‚Äì page builder you can trust with your business
* Bricks – amazing block editor with many templates
* Brizy – next-gen website builder that anyone can use
* and more…

THEMES
* Avada ‚Äì swiss army knife of WordPress themes
* Divi ‚Äì most popular WordPress theme in the world
* BeTheme ‚Äì more than just WordPress theme
* Bridge ‚Äì not just a theme, it‚Äôs a collection of amazing examples
* Flatsome ‚Äì multi-purpose responsive WooCommerce theme
* and more‚Ä¶

üéì CONCLUSION

GutenDraw empowers you to effortlessly incorporate dynamic sketches and diagrams directly into your WordPress posts and pages. Unlock a new level of visual storytelling and enhance the impact of your content. With GutenDraw, you can harness the power of the Excalidraw platform, allowing you to create professional-grade diagrams, flowcharts, and freehand sketches without leaving your WordPress editor. Streamline your creative process and bring your ideas to life with ease.

üíº GDPR & Privacy

  • We do not collect or store any information about our visitors or users without their consent.
  • We also do not transfer any data to external servers without users’ consent.
  • The purpose of our plugin is to help create diagrams and sketches..
sections.installation:
Setup is easy and takes only a few minutes.

  1. Download the plugin, unpack it and upload the [gutendraw] folder to your wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress.
  3. Create a new post or page
  4. Add the GutenDraw Block from the block category called “Widgets” in the Gutenberg editor.
  5. You can change block settings from the right-side settings sidebar.
    You‚Äôre done. Enjoy.
sections.faq:
Why should I use GutenDraw?

By using GutenDraw, you can elevate your content with visually appealing diagrams that enhance understanding and engagement, all while enjoying a seamless and efficient creation process.

I installed the plugin, what’s next?

Once activated, the plugin will automatically create a menu where you can create diagrams and set up plugin options. Just go to “GutenDraw” -> “All Diagrams” and start creating your own sketches and schemas.

Is it possible for any user to create and modify diagrams?

Everything is under the control of the administrator. Our GutenDraw plugin has fine-grained permission settings, allowing you to customize the security policy differently for each role. For example, some roles can create, view, edit, and publish diagrams, while others are only allowed to view them.

Does GutenDraw work with Gutenberg?

Absolutely! GutenDraw is compatible with the new block editor called Gutenberg. This functionality is available out of the box, even in the free version.

Does GutenDraw work with page builders?

Without a doubt, GutenDraw works with most popular web page builders such as Elementor, Divi, Beaver Builder, Visual Composer, WP Bakery, Brizy, Blocks, and many others. If your page builder or third-party plugin uses the standard WordPress media modal dialog to select images, the plugin will also work and display folders.

How many sites is a GutenDraw Pro license valid for?

The GutenDraw Pro license is valid for one domain (including subdomains).

Where is the developer version hosted?

The developer version is available here.

I’d like access to more features and support. How can I get this?

You can access additional features and support by visiting the CodeCanyon website and purchasing the pro version. By purchasing the plugin, you gain access to the full version of the GutenDraw WordPress plugin, along with automatic updates and support.

Is that a one-time payment for GutenDraw Pro?

Absolutely! The GutenDraw lifetime license costs a one-time fee, allowing you to use it on a single site and receive unlimited updates.
sections.changelog:
1.2.0

  • Mod: extended rights management, added new rights ‘view’, ‘create’, ‘edit’, ‘delete’, ‘publish’
  • Mod: added state for a diagram: ‘draft’, ‘publish’

1.1.0

  • New: added access rights management for user roles, options ‘all’, ‘by_role’, and ‘private’
  • New: added translation support for German (DE), Spanish (ES), Italian (IT), French (FR), and Russian (RU)

1.0.0

  • Initial release
